About Me

A passionate and creative web developer with experience in building responsive and user-friendly websites. I am skilled in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and various front-end frameworks. I am also interested in UX/UI design and enjoy exploring new technologies.

Projects

Project 1: Website Redesign

Redesigned a company's website to improve usability and enhance the overall user experience. Implemented responsive design techniques to ensure a consistent experience across various screen sizes.

Project 2: E-commerce App

Developed a full-stack e-commerce application using React and Node.js. Implemented features such as product browsing, shopping cart, and secure payment processing.

Project 3: Mobile App

Created a mobile app using Flutter for Android and iOS platforms. Implemented features such as user authentication, location tracking, and real-time updates.
